name: MORGENSHTERN
description: MORGENSHTERN: easygame is a dynamic fighting game in which you have to fight with different opponents using martial arts techniques. You are waited by ten interesting fights with absolutely unpredictable opponents.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 450 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 770 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: You may need to update the driver for your video card and sound card
